Tests network columns are sortable.

Sorted by: name
    abe.png
    abe.png
    foo.bar
    style.css

Sorted by: status
    abe.png
    style.css
    abe.png
    foo.bar

Sorted by: name
    style.css
    foo.bar
    abe.png
    abe.png

Sorted by: type
    abe.png
    style.css
    abe.png
    foo.bar
